The #Rockets⁠ ⁠ are now up 1.5 games over the Spurs, who are tied with the Jazz for 6th place.
Not sure how much do I want that gap to grow, since I would rather Houston to finish 6th and potentially avoid GSW until the wcf over finishing 4/5 and meeting GSW in the 2nd round.

But on the other hand:
1. you’ll need to beat GSW anyway in order to get to the finals
2. By losing in the 2nd round over losing in the conference finals you save some money because Capela doesn’t get his WCF incentive
3. The whole Team would be more fresh and have more legs
